headline: Vistra Ties Texas Data Center Deals To Long Term Power Demand Story
summary: Vistra (NYSE:VST) has secured major new power contracts with Texas data centers, tying its generation fleet more directly to fast growing electricity demand. The company is being highlighted by analysts as a key beneficiary of rising power needs linked to data center build outs and broader electrification trends. Vistra operates as an integrated power company, supplying electricity and related services across competitive markets, including Texas. The new data center contracts connect its...
